amendment.description: Amendment sought to strike a provision of the bill which removes the ability of the Environmental Appeals Board to remand or deny the issuance of clean air permits for offshore energy exploration and extraction.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 6 printed in Part A of House Report 112-111 to strike underlying text that eliminates the ability of the Environmental Appeals Board (EAB) to remand or deny the issuance of Clean Air Act permits for offshore energy exploration and extraction.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Quigley amendment (A006) Failed by recorded vote: 173 - 251 (Roll no. 472).

action.text: Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Quigley amendment (A006) Failed by recorded vote: 173 - 251 (Roll no. 472).
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A006) offered by Mr. Quigley.
